name: Touchtech
tag_list: multi-touch, multitouch, touch, software, nui, experience, technology, kinect
overview:
We believe social interaction, ideas and experiences are enhanced through the use of exceptional interactive technology.

Touchtech is an award-winning technology company with more than 3 years of multi-touch software development experience. We offer compatibility with all significant multi-touch hardware technology platforms that are available. We also developing applications using Kinect for Xbox.

We are delivering high-quality experiences for a range of local and international brands such as Volvo, Absolut Vodka, Carlsberg, GÃ¶teborg & Co, Nobia, Betsson, Swedish Match, Maritime Museum & Aquarium among others.
